alert.note: Alert for Alger; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT LUCE...NORTHEASTERN SCHOOLCRAFT AND NORTHEASTERN ALGER COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Lower Tahquamenon Falls State Park to 8 miles southeast of Muskallonge State Park to 10 miles southeast of Grand Marais. Movement was southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Newberry, Grand Marais, Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, Muskallonge State Park, Grand Sable Dunes, Beaver Lake, Pine Stump Junction, Deer Park, Soo Junction, Four Mile Corner, Snyder Lake, Dollarville, Betsy Lake, Nawakwa Lake, Kingston Lake, and Crisp Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
